name: Deep Breathing
description:
Our submission for Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam.  The theme of the jam was "Deeper and Deeper". We decided to create a game about going deeper and deeper into the self through meditation. This interactive experience will have you flow into various states of consciousness.

How To Play:

Watch your breathing circle. Press the space bar when the circle is growing to take a deep breath. Release the space bar as the circle shrinks to exhale. Try breathing along with the pulse, it helps with the game and with real world stress!

Move the left and right arrow keys to aim your breath. On exhale, a puff of air will travel and dissolve your distractions as your concentration grows.

Credits:

Victor Lalo (me) - 3D Modeling, Animation, Scripting, Audio, Transitions

Fede Rozenberg - Systems Programming, Mechanics, Writing, Transitions

Source Code: https://github.com/victorlalo/Ludum-Dare-48

Assets Used:

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/relaxing

House Model: https://syntystore.com/collections/simple-series/products/simple-house-interiors...

Skybox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/spaceskies-free-...
